thread.section_title: The Flights Guru Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of The Flights Guru | theflightsguru.co.uk
thread.title: Ben Bhattal
thread.title_full: The Flights Guru reviewed by Ben Bhattal

author: Ben Bhattal
title: Ben Bhattal
text:
Having never used The Flights Guru before, Arnold put me at ease and made sure he searched for the best deal available for me. This meant he was going away looking at a number of different options but kept me updated the whole time.
From the first point of contact through to booking Arnold was exceptional and a credit to the company - I will be booking with The Flights Guru again!
